name: Heroes of Orn: Darkness Demo
description:
This is a demo for the upcoming game, Heroes of Orn: Darkness. It consists of 1 level that typically takes 1-2 hours to complete. 

Heroes of Orn: Darkness is a base building fantasy RTS game with a twist, your heroes make their own decisions. 

Features

  • Build and upgrade various buildings to collect resources and gain power for your kingdom.
  • Recruit different classes of heroes who will make their own decisions.
  • Influence the decisions of your heroes indirectly and help provide them with items and equipment.
  • Use spells to turn the tide of battle and help your kingdom prosper.

Note: This game is still actively in development and may have bugs, balance issues, or crashes. Please let us know if you run into any problems so we can continue to improve the game. Thank you!
